alert.note: Alert for Baca; Las Animas (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 23 at 5:02PM MDT until June 23 at 5:45PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Baca County in southeastern Colorado... Southeastern Las Animas County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 545 PM MDT. * At 502 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 12 miles northwest of Kenton, or 35 miles southwest of Springfield, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Baca and southeastern Las Animas Counties. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
